Member Function Documentation

virtual bool sxsdk::importer_interface::accepts_text_stream ( void *  aux = 0  )  [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Whether or not to handle text files.

If returns true, text_stream_interface is passed as an argument of do_import().

virtual bool sxsdk::importer_interface::can_import_from_stream ( void *  aux = 0  )  [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns whether to import from the stream.

If returns false, Shade calls do_import() with the import stream interface as a null pointer, without displaying the Open dialog.

Therefore, the importer plugin can select and load a file on its own.

virtual void sxsdk::importer_interface::do_import ( sxsdk::scene_interface *  scene,
sxsdk::stream_interface *  stream,
sxsdk::text_stream_interface *  text_stream,
void *  aux = 0 
) [pure virtual]

Overridable. The function called during import.

Parameters:
scene the scene to import to
stream the stream to import from
text_stream The text stream to import from. Passed only when accepts_text_stream() returns true.

void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Called before importing process.

Parameters:
t the transformation matrix from import dialog settings.

virtual const char* sxsdk::importer_interface::get_file_extension_description ( int  i,
void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns the file format description.

The name specifed by this function is displayed on the file type pop-up menu in the Open dialog.

Parameters:
i the index
virtual int sxsdk::importer_interface::get_number_of_file_extensions ( void *  aux = 0  )  [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns the number of file extensions to support.

Used when supporting file formats with multiple file extensions defined.

virtual bool sxsdk::importer_interface::skips_dialog ( void *  aux = 0  )  [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Override and return true in order to skip displaying the dialog.

Sets the Export dialog to appear immediately after being selected from the Export menu.
